Question: Photograph of this person by Jeremiah Gurney & Son, New York, 1867.
Hints: On 8 June 1870, this person suffered another stroke at his home after a full day's work on Edwin Drood.
On 9 November 1867, this person sailed from Liverpool for his second American reading tour.
In 1842, this person and his wife made their first trip to the United States and Canada.
